option1: Questions are great to have on hand to have a great time with your friends. if youre looking for good questions to ask in a conversation , youre in the right place. would you rather questions are fun , and ive got a lot of those for you, but here, well take it up a notch and go for the hard to answer but more interesting questions. lets start enriching your next conversation . contents best questions incredibly funny wholesome things girl things for couples faqs printable list more 15 best hard would you rather questions for worthwhile conversation unsplash jarrod reed the beauty of these hard would you rather questions is their simplicity. because if your inquiry just gets you a yes
option2: No answer, youre not likely to discover much about your conversation partner . but if you use a great would you rather question , youll end up with a lengthy response that tells you not just an exciting answer but something interesting about the person . you might even get a glimpse of their entire life . in short, tough questions like these are meant to make the conversation interesting, not dull. 1. would you rather be able to detect any lie you hear or get away with any lie you tell
